In addition, María hopes that her shop will continue growing and generating more income each time because her son is about to finish secondary school and she needs money to pay for his university.  María dreams with having a large workshop to generate much employment and to offer her son a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities to continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es:
Emprendedor y carismático son las mejores palabras para describir a Victor, un joven que a pesar de su corta edad ha decidido montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos y contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Su madre es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, y además de esto, Victor tiene 3 hermanos con síndrome de down, por lo que es su único apoyo en su hogar. Debido entonces a que los ingresos que genera su madre en el empleo no son suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, Victor decidió contribuir de la manera en que fuera posible y así montó su tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar, snack y dulces. Hace aproximadamente 1 año y medio desde que Victor tiene su tienda y esta ha venido creciendo rápidamente, motivada principalmente por la buena atención que ofrece Victor a sus clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir creciendo en su tienda y ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, Victor busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas en su tienda para hacerla más amplia y comprar un refrigerador para ofrecer productos que requieren de estar refrigerados.

De esta manera Victor aumentará sus ventas puesto que ofrecerá mayores productos y así también hará más atractiva su tienda para los clientes. Además, Victor espera que con mayores ingreos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para seguir progresando.
texts.en:
The best words to describe Víctor are enterprising and charismatic.  He is young man who despite his age has managed to set up his own business aiming at earning his own income and contribute economically to his home.  

His mother is a single mother head of household and besides that Víctor has three siblings with Down’s syndrome so he’s the only support for his home.  Because income generated by his mother in her job is insufficient to cover all household expenses, Víctor decided to contribute in whatever way possible so he opened a general store where he sells basic staple items, snacks and candy.  Víctor has had the store for about a year and a half and it’s been growing rapidly primarily thanks to the good service Víctor gives his customers.  

Víctor is looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity to do some physical upgrades to the store to make it bigger and to buy a refrigerator to be able to sell items that need to be refrigerated.  In this way, Víctor will increase sales because he’ll have more products and will make his store more attractive to customers too.  

In addition, Víctor hopes that with higher income his family will enjoy a better quality of life and greater opportunities to continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and to make physical changes to the locale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, sprinklers and insecticide.

loans.name: Ghulam Fatima's Group

texts.en:
A very talented business woman, Ghulam fatima has been operating her business for many years, purchasing clothes from various cloth markets and then selling to her neighboring areas for profit. She also has sewing skills which help her earn additional income. Now requesting a loan from Kiva partner Asasah, Ghulam will buy a variety of clothes in large quantity to resell.

Ghulam has given birth to two sons and two daughters, all of whom are young and not working. She is hopeful that her business will be improved further after this loan investment.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her clothing-sales business.

loans.name: Munawar Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Munawar bibi is a 55 year-old married woman who has three children: two boys and one daughter. Her eldest son is 25 years old and a mechanic by profession, while her second son is a driver by profession. Her daughter reads in 10th standard.  
Munawar is a very efficient and caring lady by nature. She is involved in the sewing & embroidery business. Her work brings her a good profit. She crafts beautiful embroidered designs on clothes and sews with perfect measurement. 

Her brother also lives with her family. He is involved in the medicine sales business. He runs a medical store in the community where he makes good sales from his business. Munawar has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her brother’s medicines business. He will invest the loan in buying medicines to put in his store.  She is hopeful that her brother’s business will be expanded further after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy medicines to sell

loans.name: Bol

texts.en:
Bol lives in  Dokuru bor. She sells items at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 28 years old, married, and has four children.  Three of them are in school. 

Bol heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Ajook

texts.en:
Ajook lives in Dokuru bor. She sells sugar and beans at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 years old, married, and has six children. Three of them are in school. 

Ajook heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.   This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Akur

texts.en:
Akur lives in Dokuru bor. She sells items at food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 32 years old, married, and has six children.  Four of them are in school. 

Akur heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase maize and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Dokuru bor. She sells items at a food stall, and has been in business for two years. She is 40 years old, married, and has six children.  Four of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Ayak

texts.en:
Ayak lives in Dokuru bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for two years. She is 35 years old, married, and has five children.  Four of them are in school. 

Ayak heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Saidasror

texts.ru: Саидасрор добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин, который на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Имеет арендованную землю в размере 1 гектара и более 6 лет  выращивает пшеницу, картошку, помидоры, лук, морковь и кукурузу. Его жена занимается домохозяйством и помогает мужу в бизнесе. Саидасрор запрашивает займ для покупки горюче-смазочных материалов, минеральных удобрений, саженцев помидора, семян картошки, а также хочет купить скот для выращивания и откорма с последующей продажей. Он надеется на помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Saidasror is a kind and hardworking family man, who is raising four children.  He leases one hectare of land and has been growing wheat, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, carrots and corn for over six years.  His wife is involved in household work and helps her husband with the business.  Saidasror  is requesting this loan to buy fuel and lubricants, mineral fertilizers, tomato seedlings, potato seeds and also wants to buy livestock to grow and fatten up for a subsequent sale.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mirzokarim

texts.ru: Мирзокарим добрый и трудолюбивый человек, который на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Он занимается приготовлением и продажей пирожков, белящей и чебуреков. Свой бизнес он начал в 1995 году с собственными денежными средствами. Его торговая точка находится на рынке. Мирзокарим запрашивает займ для покупки муки, масло, лука, картошки, дрожжей и других продуктов. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Mirzokarim is a kind and hardworking person, who is raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Mirzokarim is involved in preparing and selling piroshki, belyashi and chebureki (various types of meat pies).  He started his business in 1995 with his own monetary funds.  His retail outlet is located at a market.  Mirzokarim is requesting this loan to buy flour, oil, onions, potatoes, yeast and other products.  He relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, onions and potatoes

loans.name: Marufdjan

texts.ru: Маруфджан женат и на воспитании  имеет четверых детей. Маруфджан  трудолюбивый и добрый человекам. Более 12 лет он занимается предоставлением услуг такси и имеет богатый опыт. Владеет профессиональными водительскими качествами. Маруфджан хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и с этой целью запрашивает займ для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Marufdjan is married and raising four children.  He is a hardworking and kind person.  Marufdjan has been involved in providing a taxi service for over 12 years and has a rich experience.  He possesses professional driver qualities.  Marufdjan wants to improve his living conditions and is, thus, requesting this loan to repair his house.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Abduvohid

texts.ru: Абдувохид добрый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Его жена учительница, а он более 11 лет занимается производством и продажей мебели. Он также изготавливает оконные рамы и двери. Данный бизнес приносит ему стабильный доход и покрывает все его семейные расходы. Абдулвохид запрашивает займ для строительства дома. На полученный займ он намерен купить кирпич и доски. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abduvohid is a kind and goal-oriented person.  He is married and raising two children.  His wife is a teacher, and he has been involved in manufacturing and selling furniture for over 11 years.  He also makes window frames and doors.  This business yields a stable income and covers all of his family expenses.  Abduvohid is requesting this loan to build a house.  He intends to use this loan to buy bricks and wood.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to build a house

loans.name: Abdulvahob

texts.ru: Более 8 лет Абдулвахоб занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродуктов. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. В основном Абдулвахоб выращивает пшеницу, лук и арбузы. На 5-ти сотках земли выращивает пшеницу, на 20 сотках лук, а 80 сотках выращивает арбуз. Абдулвахоб хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и оплаты за услуг трактора. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abdulvahob has been involved in growing and selling agricultural crops for over eight years.  He is married and raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Abdulvahob primarily grows wheat, onions and watermelons.  He grows wheat on five sotkas of land, onions on 20 sotkas and watermelons on 80 sotkas.  Abdulvahob wants to obtain this loan to buy seeds,mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants and to pay for a tractor service.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо добрая и трудолюбивая женщина, она заботливая и любящая  жена. Муж рабочий, а она занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозкультур. Имеет в аренду земельный участок, и там посеяла пшеницу, кукурузу, и другие культуры. В бизнесе помогает ей е муж. Мехринисо запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, семян, горюче-смазочных материалов и оплаты за услуги трактора. Она надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en:
Mehriniso is a good and hard-working woman, and a caring and loving wife. Her husband is a worker, and she is engaged in growing and selling crops. She rents a piece of land, and there she plants wheat, corn and other crops. Her husband helps her with this business. 

Mehriniso is requesting a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers, seeds, fuel and lubricants and to pay for tractor services. She hopes for your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers, seeds, fuel and lubricants, and to pay for tractor services.

loans.name: Kholmumin

texts.ru: Холмумин женат, имеет пятерых детей. Он добрый и трудолюбивый человек, который более 6 лет занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозкультур. Холмумин хотел бы получить займ в размере 5100 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и семян для посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Kholmumin is married and has five children. He is a good and hard-working man, who has been engaged in growing and selling crops for more than six years. 

Kholmumin would like to receive a loan in the amount of 5,100 somoni for the purchase of mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants and seeds for sowing. He hopes for your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers, seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cabbage, radishes and imported oranges and greens

loans.name: Jenny Julieta

texts.es:
Jenny es una joven de 30 años de edad, convive con su pareja y tiene 2 hijos pequeños, su actividad principal es la venta de comida en una feria importante de su comunidad, simultáneamente a eso también vende ropa, y es precisamente para ello que Jenny necesita de un préstamo, para comprar mas mercadería como ropa y zapatos para vender en la feria.
Jenny quiere con el tiempo comprar un carro para movilizar sus productos de su casa a la feria  y así ahorrar tiempo y dinero, además significa más comodidad para su comercio.
Jenny pertenece al Banco comunal “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Jenny is 30 years old, she lives with her partner and she has 2 young children. Her main activity is selling food in a very important fair of her community. On top of this she also sells clothes, and it is precisely for this that Jenny needs a loan: to buy products such as clothes and shoes to sell during the fair.
In time, Jenny wants to buy a car to transport her products from her house to the fair, in order to save time and money; this would also mean engaging more comfortably in her activity.
Jenny is a member of “Señor de los Temblores II” (Lord of Earthquakes II), a Communal Bank of the town of Cusco.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Bibiana Andrea

texts.es:
Bibiana es una gran emprendedora que vio en su capacidad para crear artesanías una oportunidad de negocio y así contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Bibiana se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 12 años quien es su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Hace aproximadamente 2 años, Bibiana comenzó fabricando desde su casa algunos artículos en madera y se los ofreció a sus amigos; al ver que sus productos habían tenido una gran acogida por parte de ellos, decidió comenzar a producir en mayor cantidad y ofrecer a más personas para así generar ingresos. Fue así entonces como se pasó para una carpintería de un amigo donde este le brindó un pequeño espacio para elaborar sus productos y así fue poco a poco creciendo hasta tener muy buenas ventas en su negocio. Actualmente, Bibiana tiene un buen negocio donde puede vender lo necesario para contribuir económicamente para los gastos de su hogar y poder brindarle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Ahora, Bibiana espera trasladar la producción de su negocio para la terraza de su casa, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para elaborar sus productos.

De esta manera Bibiana tendrá sus propias herramientas de trabajo para fabricar sus productos y podrá estar en la comodidad de su hogar estando al cuidado de su hijo. Además, así seguirá creciendo y podrá en un futuro tener un gran negocio que le brinde la oportunidad de brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Bibiana is a great entrepreneur who saw in her ability to make crafts a business opportunity to contribute economically to her home.  Bibiana is married and has a 12 year old son who is her motivation to work hard in her business.

About two years ago, Bibiana started making wood items at home that she’d sell to her friends.  Seeing that her items were warmly received by them she decided to start producing them in larger amounts and to sell them to more people to generate income.  This is how she then moved into a friend’s carpentry shop where he let her us a small space there to make her items and this is how she gradually grew to have good business sales.  Currently, Bibiana has a business where she can sell enough to contribute economically to her home’s expenses and to provide a better quality of life for her son.  Now, Bibiana plans to move production to her yard at home so is looking for a loan to buy work tools to make her products.

In this way Bibiana will have her own work tools to manufacture her products and will be able to do so in the comfort of her own home while caring for her son.  In addition, she will continue to grow this way and in future be able to have a great business that will give her the opportunity of providing her family with a better quality of life and better opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Akoi

texts.en:
Akoi lives in Dokuru bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for one year. She is 28 years old, married, and has four children.   Three of them are in school. 

Akoi heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC.  She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Nyanwut

texts.en:
Nyanwut lives in Dokuru bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children.  Three of them are in school. 

Nyanwut heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase rice and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Roman

texts.ru:
Роман с женой и двумя сыновьями живет в Ивано-Франковске. Он занимается ремонтом двигателей для автомобилей. Для этого Роман арендует помещение размером в 45 квадратных метров в центральной части города. Мастерская Романа известна среди автовладельцев в городе. Он всегда предоставляет только отменное качество выполненных работ, а также и послегарантийное обслуживание всем своим клиентам. Роман работает в этой сфере уже 18 лет. На данный момент его чистая прибыль составляет около 5 000 гривен.  

Роман планирует вложить кредит в 12 000 гривен в приобретение токарного станка, который необходим ему для работы в мастерской. С помощью станка Роман сможет самостоятельно выполнять реставрацию узлов ходовой части транспортных средств. Роман начинал работать в собственном гараже. Постепенно вкладывая средства в бизнес, он смог перейти в более просторное арендованное помещение, приобрести бус для работы, а также поменять квартиру для семьи с двухкомнатной на 3-комнатную и сделать в ней отличный ремонт. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Roman lives in Ivano-Frankivsk together with his wife and two sons. He works with repairing engines for cars. For this, he rents 45 square meters large premises in a central part of the city. Roman's workshop is famous among the car owners in the city. He always performs work of excellent quality, as well as after-sales service to customers. 

Roman has been working in this area for 18 years. Currently, his net profit is around 5 000 hryvnia. Roman plans to invest his loan of 12 000 hryvnia in a lathe (a machine tool), which is necessary for his work at the workshop. With the help of the lathe, Roman can independently carry out restoration of the chassis components of a vehicle. 

Roman has started working in his own garage. Gradually investing in the business, he was able to move to more spacious premises, to acquire a bus for the work, and further to move from a two-room flat to a three-room flat with his family, and to restore the new flat.

loans.use: to purchase a lathe for his garage

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 34 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, con 2 hijos a su cargo y vive en casa de sus padres y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, la zona cuenta con mas de 10 mil habitantes y vive en zona urbana, y es  muy responsable.
Mariela se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera nesecidad, tales como: arroz, azúcar,  menestras y otros, todo esto desde hace 3 años, y lo realiza en su domicilio.
El monto solicitado del préstamo  es de 2000 nuevos soles y lo necesita  para invertirlo en su  negocio, específicamente para surtirlo y adquirir algunos andamios y artículos de primera nesecidad, tales como papel higiénico, leches, atunes y otros; ya que cuenta con clientes específicos .
texts.en:
Mariela is 34 years old, she is single and she has 2 children depending on her. She lives in her parents’ house, she is very responsible and she can count on good references on a personal as well as professional level in her area. She lives in a urban area with more that 10 thousand inhabitants. references
Mariela sells basic necessities, such as rice, sugar and vegetable stews among others. She has been engaged in this activity for 3 years and her shop is set in her house.
She is requesting a loan of 2000 PEN to invest it in her activity, in particular to stock it up by purchasing some scaffolds and some basic necessities such as toilet paper, milk, tuna and other products specifically requested by her customers.

loans.use: To buy some scaffolds, toilet paper, milk, tuna and other products for her shop.

loans.name: Carmen Elida

texts.es:
Carmen es una persona muy emprendedora, pues observó una necesidad que no estaba siendo satisfecha en su municipio y decidió atenderla con la creación de su negocio. Carmen alquila lavadoras a las personas de su municipio, ya que en este muy pocas personas tienen este elemento en el hogar, y de esta manera genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye al sostenimiento de su hogar, donde convive con su esposo y sus 6 hijos. Carmen inició hace aproximadamente 5 años con este negocio y ha venido creciendo rápidamente gracias al buen servicio que ofrece a sus clientes. Actualmente, la demanda por su servicio es mayor que lo que puede ofrecer Carmen, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de 3 lavadoras para poder aumentar su capacidad y así poder atender todos los pedidos de sus clientes.

De esta manera sus ingresos mensuales podrán aumentar considerablemente, pues tendrá la oportunidad de atender a toda la demanda por sus servicios. Además podrá seguir generando ingresos con los cuales podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Carmen is a very enterprising person because she noted a need that wasn’t being met in her town and decided to take it on by crating her own business.  Carmen rents out washing machines to people in her town because very few people have these appliances in their homes.  In this way she generates income that helps support her home where she lives with her husband and six children.

Carmen started the business about five years ago and it’s been growing rapidly thanks to the good service she offers her customers.  Currently, demand is higher than Carmen’s able to meet and this is why she’s looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy three washing machines to increase capacity and be able to meet all customer demand.

In this way her monthly income will increase considerably because she will be able to meet all demand for her services.  In addition, she will be able to continue generating income to offer her family a better quality of life and increased opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy three washing machines.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis Fernando es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre ha querido ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio para generar ingresos que se lo permitan. Hace aproximadamente 14 años tiene Luis Fernando su kiosco donde ofrece snack, dulces y gaseosas a sus clientes, y tiene la gran ventaja que está ubicado al lado de una cancha donde practican deporte constantemente y esto le atrae gran cantidad de clientes. Además de esto, Luis Fernando es un gran promotor del deporte y junto con algunas personas de su municipio han promovido torneos y competencias en esta cancha, por lo que ha brindado un gran aporte social a su comunidad para que tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que se acerca la temporada de inicio de torneos, Luis Fernando busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de snack, dulces y gaseosas para surtir su negocio y reparar el techo de su kiosco que fue afectado por la fuerte temporada invernal.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y podrá seguir generando ingresos con los que pueda ofrecer una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Luis Fernando is a very hardworking person who has always wanted to offer his family a good quality of life and this is why he works hard in his business to generate income that will make this possible.  

For about 14 years Luis Fernando has had a kiosk where he sells snacks, candy and soft-drinks to his customers.  He has a big advantage because it’s located next to sports venue where sports are practiced constantly which brings him a great number of customers.  

In addition to this Luis Fernando is a great sports promoter and together with some other people in the community has promoted tournaments and competitions in this venue which has contributed an important social benefit to the community improving their quality of life.  

Because of this, the tournament season is approaching and Luis Fernando is looking for a loan to stock up on snacks, candy and soft-drinks to have his business well-stocked; he also needs to repair the roof of the kiosk that was affected by the strong winter weather.  In this way his business will continue to grow and he will be able to continue to generate income to provide a good quality of life to his wife and three children.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store and to repair the roof which was affected by the heavy rains.

loans.name: Rimma

texts.ru:
Римма живет и работает в Каховке, Херсонская область. Она занимается реализацией женской и подростковой одежды на одном из местных рынков. Римма занимается этим бизнесом уже 14 лет. Ее чистая прибыль составляет около 7 000 гривен.  

Римме необходим кредит суммой в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы пополнить сезонный ассортимент единиц одежды на полученную сумму. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Rimma lives and works in Kahovka, Kherson region.  She is involved in selling women's and adolescent clothing at one of the local markets.  Rimma has been in this business for 14 years.  Her net profit amounts to about 7 000 hryvnia.  Rimma needs a loan in the amount of 10 000 hryvnia in order to refill her seasonal selection of clothing with the obtained sum.

loans.use: to refill seasonal selection of clothing

loans.name: Alla

texts.ru:
Алла с семьей живет в Нежине. На одном из местных рынков у нее есть две торговых точки, на которых она торгует нижним бельем, носками, колготами, женскими свитерами, гольфами и т.п. Место расположения торговых мест – очень удачное и проходное. В этой сфере Алла работает уже 15 лет. Ее чистая прибыль составляет около 4 500 гривен в месяц. 

Алла обратилась в КИВА за кредитом в 12 000 гривен для того, чтобы пополнить запас белья, ночнушек, легких свитеров, гольфов для реализации в этом сезоне и разнообразить ассортимент товара. Алла ожидает получить хороший доход от реализации приобретенной группы товаров. В дальнейшем Алла надеется развивать свой бизнес, обеспечивая семью всем необходимым. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Alla and her family live in Nezhin.  She has two retail outlets at one of the local markets, where she sells undergarments, socks, stockings, women's sweaters, knee-high socks, etc.  The location of the retail outlets is very convenient and well-traveled.  Alla has been working in this business for 15 years.  Her net profit amounts to about 4 500 hryvnia per month.  Alla requested a loan in the amount of 12 000 hryvnia from Kiva in order to refill her inventory of undergarments, sleepwear, light sweaters, knee-high socks for sale during this season and to vary her merchandise selection.  Alla expects to earn a good income from selling this inventory of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to develop her business and provide her family with all of the necessities.

loans.use: to refill her inventory of undergarments, sleepwear, light sweaters, knee-high socks for sale during this season and to vary her merchandise selection

loans.name: Natalia Lorena

texts.es:
Natalia es una joven emprendedora que decidió montar su propio negocio para poder contribuir económicamente en su hogar para ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Natalia tiene 21 años y tiene una hija de 3 meses de nacido, a quien le quiere brindar un buen crecimiento brindándole todo lo que necesita. Natalia montó un café Internet donde ofrece a sus clientes el servicio de Internet y de llamadas telefónicas a larga distancia. Gracias al buen servicio que ofrece, ha tenido la oportunidad de captar un gran número de clientes para su negocio. Natalia quiere que su negocio crezca y por esto viene trabajando fuertemente para lograr este objetivo, y esto se ve reflejado en que la capacidad de su negocio ya es insuficiente para poder sostener toda la demanda de sus clientes. Es por esto que Natalia busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de 2 computadores para aumentar su capacidad y poder atender toda la demanda del mercado.

De esta manera su negocio saldrá adelante y seguirá creciendo para generarle mayores ingresos en su familia y ofrecer a su hija una buena calidad de vida y un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Natalia is a young entrepreneur who decided to set up her own business to contribute economically to her home and offer her family a better quality of life.

Natalia is 21 years old and has a three month old daughter that she wants to provide everything she needs to grow well.  Natalia set up an Internet café where she offers her customers Internet access and long distance phone service.  Thanks to the good service she provides she’s won over many customers for her business.  

Natalia would like her business to grow and this is why she’s working hard toward this goal and this is reflected in the capacity of her business which is already insufficient to meet demand which is why Natalia is looking for a loan to buy two computers to increase capacity and meet all demand in her market.

In this way her business will move ahead and continue to grow to generate higher income for her family and to offer her daughter a good quality of life and an economically stable future.

loans.use: to buy two computers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products to start her business.

loans.name: Agok

texts.en:
Agok lives in Bor. She has a food stall, and has been in business for four years. She is 32 years old, married, and has six children, five of whom are still in school. 

Agok heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Nyankor

texts.en:
Nyankor lives in Bor. She has a food stall, and has been in business for one year. She is 32 years old, married, and has six children, five of whom are still in school. 

Nyankor heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Aleksei

texts.ru:
Алексей – из Каменки. Вместе с семьей они живут в этом городке и занимаются тепличным бизнесом. Этот вид деятельности очень популярен в этой части страны, где многие живут за счет ведения сельского хозяйства. У Алексея несколько больших теплиц, две из них размером 60х14 метров и 30х20 метров, есть еще 3 маленькие и 2 теплицы под рассаду. Одна из теплиц отапливается, ее используют для рассады. Алексей занимается этим бизнесом уже 30 лет. В хозяйство он вложил около 70 000 гривен. Ежегодно затраты на семена и пленку составляют около 25 000 гривен. 

Алексей планирует вложить кредит в 10 000 гривен в закупку рассады на 5 000 гривен и пленки на 4 500 гривен,  а также установку простейшей системы капельного орошения на 500 гривен. Со временем Алексей мечтает сделать отопление во всех теплицах, чтобы выращивать овощи еще раньше и начинать торговлю ранней весной.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Aleksei is from Kamenka.  He and his family live in this town and are involved in a greenhouse business.  This type of business is very popular in this part of the country, where many people make a living from running agricultural businesses.  Aleksei has several large greenhouses, two of them are 60x14 meters and 30x20 meters.  He also has three small and two greenhouses for seedlings.  One of his greenhouses has heating and is used for seedlings.  Aleksei has been involved in this business for 30 years.  He invested about 70 000 hryvnia into the business.  His annual expenses for seeds and plastic amount to about 25 000 hryvnia.  Aleksei plans to invest the 10 000 hryvnia loan into a purchase of seedlings with 5 000 hryvnia and plastic with 4 500 hryvnia, and also into an installation of a drip irrigation system with 500 hryvnia.  With time, Aleksei dreams of providing heating for all of his greenhouses in order to grow vegetables earlier and start sales in early spring.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, plastic and install a drip irrigation system

loans.name: Fuego Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Fuego esta integrado por  seis mujeres trabajadoras y humildes con deseos de mejorar su vida y las de sus familias.
Las integrantes de este grupo son originarias de pinotepa nacional tierra de progreso y de superación.
Una tradición de la población es la fiesta de semana santa  ya que vienen los juegos para que los niños se diviertan.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora Herminia Bernardita de  cuarenta dos años de edad una señora trabajadora y alegre.
Doña Herminia como mejor la conocen sus compañeras de grupo se dedica  a la venta de totopitos desde hace cinco años lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es  atender bien a sus clientes, nos dice que se divierte mucho preparando  la masa y haciendo los totopitos.
Nos dice que hace solo pedidos  y en ocasiones los vende en su casa pero no sale a vender en las calles de su comunidad.
También se dedica a la vende de gelatinas, flanes  desde hace tres años  dejo de hacer sus gelatinas hace  cuatro meses por que no tenia recursos para volver a elaborar sus gelatinas.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor  Martín  con quien tiene  dos hijas quienes ya están casadas Lizeth y Adilene.
Doña Herminia pidió el préstamo para la compra de más leños y maíz para la elaboración de totopitos, ella nos dice que compra la leña antes que venga  la época donde llueve mucho ya que en esa época esta muy cara la leña y el maíz.
Nos comenta que esta muy contenta con fundacion por ayudarla a que su vida mejore  cada día mas y por darle la oportunidad  para que pueda seguir con su negocio.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Maricela – quien se dedica a la venta de postres.
Lisset- quien se dedica a la venta de comida.
Adilene-quien se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Blanca Estela- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Wenceslada Carmela-quien se dedica a la venta de carne de res.
Le dan las gracias a fundacion por ayudarlas a que sus vidas mejoren y puedan  tener mas ganancias y así engrandecer su negocio.
texts.en:
This group, called Fuego (Fire), is made up of six hard-working and humble women who wish to improve their lives and the lives of their families.  The members of this group are from Pinotepa Nacional, the land of progress and improvement.  One tradition of the population is the fiesta of Semana Santa (Holy Week) during which the games come so that children can entertain themselves.  

One of the members of this group is Señora Herminia Bernardita, a 42-year-old, hard-working, and happy woman.  Doña Herminia, as she is better known by her friends in the group, makes a living selling tortilla chips, which she has done for five years.  What she likes most about her business is to take good care of her customers, and she tells us that she really enjoys preparing the dough and making the tortilla chips.  She says that she only makes pre-orders and on occasion sells them in her house, but she does not go out to sell in the streets of her community.  She also has been making a living selling jellies and flans for three years, but she stopped making them four months ago because she has not had the resources to prepare her jellies.  She is happily married to Señor Martín with whom she has two daughters who are already married; Lizeth and Adilene.  

Doña Herminia asked for the loan in order to buy more firewood and corn for making tortilla chips.  She tells us that she buys the firewood before the rainy season begins because during that time the firewood and the corn is very expensive.  She says that she is very happy with the Foundation for helping her to improve her life more each day and for giving her the opportunity to continue with her business.

The other members of the group are:
Maricela -  she makes a living selling cakes.
Lisset - she makes a living selling food.
Adilene - she makes a living selling perfume.
Blanca Estela - she makes a living selling Mexican snacks.
Wenceslada Carmela - she makes a living selling beef.

They give thanks to the Foundation for helping them to improve their lives and to make more profit and thus grow their business.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood for making tortilla chips.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paint.

loans.name: Cruz Helena

texts.es:
Cruz Helena es una persona que ha tenido una gran fortaleza para superar todas las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Cruz Helena es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos, ya que su esposo murió hace aproximadamente 8 años y ella quedó a cargo de todas las obligaciones de su hogar. Durante un largo tiempo estuvo divagando en diferentes labores con el ánimo de generar los ingresos que requería para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, y desde hace aproximadamente 4 años tomó un curso de artesanías donde aprendió a pintar cuadros y viene trabajando con esto de entonces. Los primeros diseños los vendía a sus amigos y familiares, y al ver que los productos tuvieron mucha acogida, siguió pintando para ofrecer a muchas personas y así generar los ingresos para su hogar. Actualmente Cruz Helena tiene una gran clientela y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenos pedidos, y con el ánimo de entregar los que tiene pendientes busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos y materias primas para pintar los cuadros.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo al poder entregar los pedidos a tiempo, además podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar y así ofrecer a sus 4 hijos una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Cruz Helena is a person with great strength that she has needed to overcome all of the adversity in her life.  Cruz Helena is a single mother of four children as her husband died about eight years ago and she took on all of the obligations of the household.  For a long time she went from job to job trying to earn enough income to sustain her household and four years ago she took an art class where she learned to paint pictures and since then she has worked doing this.  She sold her first pieces to family and friends and when she saw how well-received they were she continued painting in order to offer them to more people and earn income for her household.  Cruz Helena currently has a large clientele and this has allowed her to have many orders and with the aim of completing her current orders she is requesting a loan which will give her the opportunity to purchase materials and supplies to paint the pictures.

In this way her business will continue to grow as she will be able to deliver the orders on time and will also be able to continue earning the necessary income to maintain her household expenses and offer her children a better quality of life and better economic  opportunities.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies for painting pictures.

loans.name: Adau

texts.en:
Adau lives in Bor. She has a food stall, and has been in business for one year. She is 30 years old, married, and has six children, four of whom are still in school. 

Adau heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Faizali

texts.ru: Файзали добрый и трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более одного года он занимается предоставлением услуг по перевозке грузов (автоперевозкой). Он также дополнительно занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. Файзали запрашивает займ для покупки запчастей для своей автомашины, а также продуктов питания для своего магазина. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Faizali is a kind and hardworking man. He is married and is raising four children. He has been providing a freight delivery service for more than one year. Additionally he also buys and sells food. His wife is a homemaker. Faizali is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle and also food for his store. He is hoping for your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and food for his store.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам опытный человек в сфере сельского хозяйства. Он женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей и одного внука. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 19 лет он занимается выращиванием хлопка и кукурузы. В бизнесе помогают его два сына. Рустам хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, горюче смазочных материалов и оплаты услуг техники.
texts.en: Rustam is an experienced man in the field of agriculture. He is married and has six children and one grandson. His wife is a homemaker. Rustam has been cultivating cotton and corn for more than nineteen years. His two sons help him in the business. Rustam wants to get a loan to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants and to pay for rented equipment.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants.

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: Одилчон трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 8 лет он работает в сфере сельского хозяйства. Он занимается выращиванием картошки, а также купле- продажей скота. В бизнесе он занимается один, а иногда его жена и дети помогают. На полученную прибыль хочет провести обряды хатнатуйи своего сына. Одилчон запрашивает займ для покупки семян и ядохимикатов.
texts.en: Odiljon is a hardworking and kind man. He is married and has three children. He has been working in the field of agriculture for more than eight years. He cultivated potatoes and also buys and sells cattle. Odiljon is alone in the business, but his wife and children help him sometimes. He wants to use the received profit to hold a circumcision ceremony (hatnatuyi) for his son. Odiljon is asking for a loan to buy seeds and pesticides.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pesticides.

loans.name: Sandra Verónica

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer soltera de 21 años y tiene un hijo de 2 años. Viven juntos en "Santo Domingo" que es la cuarta ciudad con más población del Ecuador. Su población va creciendo rápidamente ya que cuenta con un rico comercio y el mayor mercado ganadero del país. Su temperatura habitual es de unos 25.5°C  y a veces llega a los 38 °C. Toda la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas"  figura como parte del territorio montañoso de la costa, de la cordillera occidental, históricamente conocida como Provincia de Yumbos y Capital de los Colibríes. Está ubicado en el trópico húmedo de América Latina. Es una provincia considerada nueva ya que fue creada en el 2007.

Sandra desea invertir en la compra de 8 cerditos y alimento balanceado. Criará a los cerditos en su granja para luego venderlos y tener mayores ingresos para de esta manera dar una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. Este es su segundo crédito con Fundación Alternativa, que es la institución que estará entre Sandra y la comunidad KIVA. En su primer crédito esta mujer se ha destacado por la puntualidad en sus pagos. Ella está muy optimista, y deseamos que le vaya muy bien con esta inversión de tal manera que pueda estar más cerca de su sueño que es tener su casa propia y de esta manera asegurar el futuro de su hijo.
texts.en:
Sandra is 21 years old, she is single and she has a 2-year-old son. They live together in Santo Domingo, Ecuador’s fourth most inhabited town. Its population is rapidly growing, thanks to its flourishing trade and to the biggest livestock market of the country. Its temperature is generally around 25.5° C (77.9° F), sometimes reaching 38°C (100.4° F). The whole province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is set in the mountain area of the coast, in the western range, also known as Provincia de Yumbos y Capital de los Colibríes (Yumbo Province and Capital of the Hummingbirds), and it is located in the humid tropic of Latin America. It is considered a new province, having been created in 2007.

Sandra wants to invest the loan in the purchase of 8 piglets and in animal feed. She will breed the piglets in her farm to then sell them and thus gain a better income, in order to offer a better standard of living to her son. This is her second loan with Fundación Alternativa, the institution through which Sandra connects to the Kiva community. During her first loan, she has stood out for being punctual with her repayments. She is very optimistic, and we wish her all the best with this investment, so that she will come closer to making her dream come true: to have a house of her own in order to grant a better future to her son.

loans.use: To buy 8 piglets and animal feed.

loans.name: Fazliddin

texts.ru: Фазлиддин женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 15 лет он занимается купле- продажей напитков, мороженного и продуктов питания. Бизнес хорошо налажен и имеет опыт в бизнесе. Имеет свой автомобиль, на котором ежедневно реализует товар оптом в кишлаке. Он сам арендует магазин в центре города. В бизнесе помогают жена и его брат. Он начал свой бизнес с продажи молочных и хлебобулочных изделий. Фазлиддин хотел бы получить займ для покупки продуктов с целью расширения ассортимента товаров.
texts.en: Fazliddin is married and raising two children.  He has been involved in buying and selling beverages, ice-cream and food products for over 15 years.  The business is set up well, and Fazliddin has experience in this business.  He owns a car, which he uses daily to sell merchandise wholesale in a village.  Fazliddin leases a store in the city center.  His wife and brother help him with the business.  Fazliddin started his business with the sales of milk and bakery goods.  He wants to obtain this loan to buy products in order to expand the selection of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase food products

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимчон добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых несовершеннолетних детей. Последние 15 лет он занимается торговлей продуктов питания и хозяйственных товаров. Имеет маленький магазин в своем джамоате. Жена и сын помогают по бизнесу. Олимчон запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов для увлечения оборотного капитала и расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Olimjon is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and raising four adolescent children.  He has been involved in selling food products and household goods for the last 15 years.  He has a small store in his village.  His wife and son help him with the business.  Olimjon is requesting this loan to buy food products in order to increase his working capital and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Alim

texts.en:
Alim lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 40 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Alim heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase onions and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase onions, beans for sale.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa es una persona muy trabajadora y siempre se ha caracterizado por querer ofrecer en su familia una mejor calidad de vida, es por esto que tiene un negocio con el cual contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Teresa se encuentra casada y tiene 5 hijos, y con su negocio ellos pueden acceder a una educación de mejor calidad y mayores oportunidades económicas. Teresa se dedica a la preparación y venta de comidas, negocio con el cual lleva trabajando 4 años aproximadamente y el cual le ha permitido tener ingresos con los cuales contribuye en su hogar a tener una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Teresa ha logrado atraer un gran número de clientes, y por esto tiene grandes pedidos en su negocio. Con el ánimo de seguir trabajando y seguir entregando los pedidos a sus clientes, Teresa busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus comidas y plásticos y empaques para ofrecerlos en una buena presentación a sus clientes.

De esta manera Teresa tendrá la oportunidad de seguir creciendo y seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, y así contribuir a tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Teresa is a very hardworking person and has always wanted to offer her family a better quality of life. That is why she owns a business which allows her to contribute financially to support her household and cover home expenses. Teresa is married and has five children. Thanks to her business they have access to a better quality education and to more economic opportunities.
Teresa works preparing and selling food. She has been in this business for approximately four years, and this has allowed her to contribute an income which helps her household have a better quality of life. 
Thanks to the good quality of her products, Teresa has been able to attract a great number of customers, and that is why her business receives large orders. She is eager to continue working and continue filling her customers' orders, which is why she is looking for a loan that will offer her the opportunity of purchasing supplies to prepare her food, as well as plastic and packaging to offer it to her customers with a good presentation.
This way Teresa will have the opportunity to keep growing and continue generating the necessary income to cover her home expenses, so that she can contribute to having a better quality of life and more opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to prepare her food, as well as plastic and packaging to offer her customers a good presentation.

loans.name: Adhol

texts.en:
Adhol lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 40 years old, married, and has four children; all of them are still in school. 

Adhol heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase onions and beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase onions, beans for sale.

loans.name: Yaar

texts.en:
Yaar lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 28 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Yaar heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase maize flour, beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, beans for sale.

loans.name: Ajah

texts.en:
Ajah lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 38 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Ajah heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar, beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans for sale.

loans.name: Munawar's Group

texts.en:
Munawar is 43 years old married woman and by this relationship she has two sons. Her elder son does a government job on monthly wage while her younger son is free and don’t do anything. 
Munawar is a very caring & efficient business woman. She is involved in clothes sales business. She buys clothes from cloth shops and different cities and sells to her community and neighboring areas on profits. Her cloth collection admires by her customers a lot. She keeps herself up-to-date about the latest trends in fashion which helps her understanding her customer’s choices and demands. 
She has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her clothes sales business. She will invest the loan in buying of clothes in larger quantity of different variety for reselling. 
She is hopeful that the loan investment will bring better financial results for her business.

loans.use: To buy clothes for selling

loans.name: Elahi Hussain's Group

texts.en:
Elahi hussain is 51 years old married woman and by this relationship she has six children: four boys and two girls. All of her children besides her youngest daughter couldn’t get education due to financial constraints. 
Her remaining children are involved in different works. Her elder son operates a sweetmeat shop while her other three sons works in a motor workshop as mechanic. Her elder daughter helps Elahi in completing the embroider orders and generating the income for the family. 
Elahi’s husband is also a mechanic and runs a motor workshop where his sons help him in repairing the vehicles of customers.  
Elahi has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s sweetmeat business. He will invest the loan in buying of material like sugar, cooking oil, milk and dry fruits in larger quantity for making sweetmeats in better quality for selling to his customers and increasing his sales. 
She is very confident that her son will make the positive use of money and expand his business further.

loans.use: To buy material for sweetmeat making and sales business

loans.name: Awuur

texts.en:
Awuur lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 35 years old, married, and has six children; all of them are still in school. 

Awuur heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase maize flour, onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, onions for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for four years. She is 35 years old, married, and has six children; three of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from staff. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar for sale.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio aprendió la actividad de la carpintería hace aproximadamente 30 años, pues sus hermanos mayores se dedicaban a esta actividad y se la enseñaron desde muy temprana edad. Gracias a esto, aprendió a hacer productos de muy buena calidad en las carpinterías de su hermano, y posteriormente decidió montar su propia carpintería aprovechando la experiencia que tenía en fabricar productos de muy buena calidad. El negocio que montó quebró al poco tiempo debido a los fuertes problemas de violencia que habían en su municipio, y por esto se vio obligado a trabajar en diferentes carpinterías como empleado y ganándose salarios muy bajos. Hace aproximadamente 2 años decidió volver a abrir su propia carpintería para probar de nuevo suerte y poder trabajar para su propia cuenta y ganándose un salario más alto que trabajando como empleado. Actualmente, Rogelio se encuentra casado y tiene 5 hijos y su carpintería sigue creciendo gracias a la buena calidad de los productos que allí fabrica. Además, su familia ha podido tener una mejor calidad de vida gracias al aumento en los ingresos de Rogelio. Con el ánimo de entregar pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes, Rogelio busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de madera para la fabricación de sus productos.

De esta manera podrá seguir entregando los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes y seguir teniendo un buen trabajo con un buen salario. Además, si su taller sigue creciendo espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y sus 5 hijos tengan acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Rogelio learned carpentry approximately 30 years ago because his older brothers did this work and taught it to him at a very young age.  Thanks to this he learned to make very good-quality products in his brother's workshop.  Later he decided to set up his own shop, making the most of the experience he had in making good-quality products.  The business he started went bankrupt very quickly because of severe problems with violence in the town, so he had to work in different carpentry workshops as an employee, and earning very low salaries.

About two years ago he decided once again to open his own shop, to try his luck again and be able to work on his own and earn a higher salary than working as an employee.  Currently Rogelio is married and has five children, and his shop continues to grow thanks to the good quality of products he makes there.  In addition, his family has been able to have a better quality of life thanks to Rogelio's increase in income.

With the intention of delivering the orders his customers have made, Rogelio is looking for a loan that gives him the opportunity to buy wood to make his products.  In this way he will be able to continue to deliver his customers' orders and have a good job with a good salary.  In addition, if his shop continues to grow, he hopes that with more income his family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and his five children will have access to a better-quality education.

loans.use: to buy wood to make his products.

loans.name: Abuor

texts.en:
Abuor lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 25 years old, married, and has two children; all of them are still in school. 

Abuor heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase wheat flour, sweat potatoes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, sweet potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Adaau

texts.en:
Adaau lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for four years. She is 26 years old, married, and has six children; two of them are still in school. 

Adaau heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase wheat flour, beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, beans for sale.

loans.name: Achol

texts.en:
Achol lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for four years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Achol heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase sugar, beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans for sale.

loans.name: Aluel

texts.en:
Aluel lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for two years. She is 22 years old, married, and has one children; is in school. 

Aluel heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase rice, beans. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans for sale.

loans.name: Asia's Group

texts.en:
Asia is 38 years old married woman and by this relationship she has three children: two sons and one daughter. Besides her youngest son others are getting an education. 
Asia’s husband operates a food stall where he sells Punjabi food items called “Nan chanay and rice.” He sells his food items to his community people and makes good earnings. Asia helps him in cooking food for his stall so he provides better quality services to his customers and keeps on earning good for the family. He has been operating his business for the past 5 years and he got good reputation among his customers for his good quality and taste of food. 
She has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy food material rice, spices, cooking oil, chick-peas, utensils and some chairs for making a sitting arrangement which will allow him improving his services on larger scale and serve more customers. 
She is hopeful that her husband’s business will be expanded further after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy food items, utensils and chairs for food stall business

loans.name: Awak

texts.en:
Awak lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for two years. She is 35 years old, married, and has two children; all of them are still in school. 

Awak heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, onions for sale.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth lives in bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for four years. She is 38 years old, married, and has five children; all of them are still in school. 

Elizabeth heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her forth loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 2500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Nyaluak

texts.en:
Nyaluak lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 25 years old, married, and has four children; two of them are still in school. 

Nyaluak heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice for sale.

loans.name: Angeth

texts.en:
Angeth lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 33 years old, married, and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Angeth heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Mariela De Jesus

texts.es:
Mariela se encuentra casada y tiene 4 hijos a quienes les quiere brindar una buena calidad de vida y una estabilidad económicas para poder tener mayores oportunidades para progresar. Es por esto que montó su propio negocio con el fin de contribuir económicamente en su hogar, ya que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar. Mariela montó un puesto de venta de comidas donde ofrece a sus clientes toda clase de comidas rápidas y gracias a esto puede tener unos ingresos para contribuir en su hogar. Por la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrece ha logrado atraer gran cantidad de clientes a su negocio y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Mariela busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos que requiere para la preparación de sus comidas y así seguir trabajando su negocio.

De esta manera Mariela tendrá la oportunidad de seguir ofreciendo a su familia una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades para progresar económicamente. Además sus 4 hijos podrán tener acceso a una mejor educación y en un futuro el acceso a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Mariela is married and has four children for whom she wishes to provide a good quality of life and economic stability so they can have better opportunities to do well in life. It is for these reasons that Mariela started her own business so she could contribute financially to the household. Her husband's income isn't sufficient to pay all the bills. She has a food stall selling all types of fast food and as a result has some income to contribute to the household. Because the meals she makes are of good quality and she gives good service, Mariela has succeeded in attracting many customers resulting in many sales. She is now seeking a loan to buy more ingredients for the food she prepares so the business can continue.

In this way she will have the opportunity to provide a good standard of living to her family and better opportunities for economic advancement. Her four children will also be able to access better educational opportunities and, in the future, a university education.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the food she makes

loans.name: Ajah

texts.en:
Ajah lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 28 years old, married, and has two children; all of them are still in school. 

Ajah heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar for sale.

loans.name: Bilquis Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Bilquis bibi is 55 years old and married with four children: three sons and one daughter. Her elder son is married and has two kids. He is a painter by profession and paints on walls and doors and houses on contract. He gets the amount after finishing the contract. Her second son involves in vegetable sales business while her younger son reads in 6th standard. Her daughter stays at home and manages the household works. 
Bilquis herself is involved in animal sales business. Her work is home based. She raises young animals and sells to the required customers. Her work earns her good income which she utilizes to pay off the utilities. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the improvement of her animal sales business. She will invest the loan in buying of (buffalo) for selling.  
She is sure that her business will return her good profits after investing the loan into it.

loans.use: To buy buffalo for selling

loans.name: Ajak

texts.en:
Ajak lives in bor. She sells at a food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 25 years old, married, and has two children; all of them are still in school. 

Ajak heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 2000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice for sale.

loans.name: Ding

texts.en:
Ding lives in bor. She sells clothes, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children; two of them are still in school. 

Ding heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase clothes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for sale.

loans.name: Nyiel

texts.en:
Nyiel lives in bor. She sells clothes, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Nyiel heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase clothes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for sale.

loans.name: Khursheed Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Khursheed bibi is a widow, and a mother of six children: four sons and two daughters. Her elder son is a loader and used his donkey cart to deliver the goods to the designated places. Her second son operates a scrap business and next to him is a driver from profession while her fourth son is free and don't do anything.  
Her daughters stay at home and help Khursheed by managing the household works. They all are very supportive towards each other. Khursheed grew up her children with great care after the death of her husband. She never lost hope and works hard. Her family respects her and loves her a lot for her efforts and dedication towards their selves. 
Khursheed has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s scrap business. He will invest the loan in buying of scrap like plastic bottles, used papers and wooden & iron items for reselling. 
She is hopeful that her son will get better financial results from his business after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy scrap for selling

loans.name: Hamidan Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Hamidan bibi is 48 years old married woman and by this relationship she has five children: three sons and two daughters. Her husband and elder son are loaders from profession. They provide their services of loading to their customers. They have their donkey carts on which they load the goods and deliver to their designated places.  
Her second son does private job in a restaurant on monthly wage while her youngest son is free and don’t do anything. Her elder daughter reads in 10th standard and her younger daughter is also free and don’t do anything. 
Hamidan is a housewife, spends her time at home and manages the household works. She makes the utmost efforts to provide comfort to her family by fulfilling their needs. 
She has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s loading business. With the loan, he will buy a new donkey cart because his current cart has become rough and doesn’t allow him to load heavy items on it which resulted affecting his work. 
She is hopeful that the new donkey cart will allow her husband providing best services to his customers and increasing his profits.

loans.use: To buy a new donkey cart for loading business

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
Ramona es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 5 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida. Gracias al conocimiento que le dio su madre, Ramona aprendió la preparación de comidas rápidas, y en el momento en que el padre de sus hijos los abandonó sin dejar alguna contribución económica, Ramona lo utilizó para generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Ramona actualmente trabaja preparando las comidas rápidas en un carro donde puede tener la comodidad para hacerlo y cuando tiene mucho trabajo el mayor de sus hijos le colabora para poder atender a todos sus clientes. Gracias al buen servicio que Ramona ofrece ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes fijos para su negocio, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas y seguir progresando junto con sus hijos. Con el ánimo de seguir trabajando en su negocio para poder seguirles ofreciendo a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida, Ramona busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos que requiere para la preparación de sus comidas.

Ramona espera que de esta manera pueda seguir trabajando en su negocio y pueda seguir teniendo la única fuente de ingresos que posee para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar y sacar sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Ramona is a single mother and head of household with five children whom she always has wanted to give a good quality of life.  Thanks to the knowledge her mother gave her, Ramona learned to prepare fast food.  When the father of her children abandoned them without any financial contribution, Ramona used the knowledge to generate the necessary income to support her household.

Currently Ramona works preparing fast food in a cart where she has the comfort to do it.  When she has a lot of work, the oldest of her children helps her attend to all her customers.  Thanks to Ramona's good service, she has managed to attract a large number of steady customers for her business, which has allowed her to have very good sales and continue making progress with her children.

With the intention of continuing to work in her business to be able to continue giving her children a good quality of life, Ramona is looking for a loan that gives her the opportunity to buy supplies she needs to prepare her dishes.

Ramona hopes that in this way she can continue to work in her business and have the only source of income she has to be able to support the household expenses and get her children ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients she needs to make her food.

loans.name: Luz Marleny

texts.es:
Luz Marleny se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 17 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio en el cual ofrece productos de papelería, productos de uso personal y prendas de vestir, y gracias a esto genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Luz Marleny siempre ha querido poder ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, y trabajando en su negocio lo ha conseguido. Su negocio ha tenido muy buena acogida por parte de sus clientes, por lo que espera seguir creciendo y seguir vendiendo buenos productos. Dado que las prendas de vestir son el producto que más compran sus clientes, Luz Marleny quiere surtir su negocio con este producto, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para surtir su negocio con el producto que más compran sus clientes.

De esta manera Luz Marleny podrá tener un gran negocio ofreciendo a sus clientes los productos que ellos requieren. Además, espera que si su negocio crece con mayores ingresos su familia pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Luz Marleny is married and has 2 children who are 14 and 17 years of age, and because the income her husband earns is not sufficient to pay the household expenses she decided to open her own business which provides stationery products, personal care products and clothing, and thanks to this she generates income which contributes economically for the household expenses.

Luz Marleny always has wanted to be able to offer her family a good quality of life, and working in her business she has succeeded. Her business has been very well received by customers, and so she expects to continue growing and continue selling good products. Since clothing is the most popular item her customers buy, Luz Marleny wants to supply her business with this product, which is why she is searching for a loan to give her the opportunity to indulge in the purchase of clothing to supply her business with the product her clients most want to buy.
